price: 36 Les impies ont-ils reçu le prix mérité de leurs infamies ?
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
